show_name: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita's Dorabian Nights
other_title: Doraemon - Le mille e una notte (Italian)
Doraemon y las mil y una aventuras (Spanish)
Eiga Doraemon: Nobita no Dorabian Night (Japanese)
哆啦A夢：大雄的天方夜譚 (Chinese (Taiwan))
哆啦A梦：大雄的天方夜谭 (Chinese (PRC))
映画ドラえもん のび太のドラビアンナイト (Japanese)
電影多啦A夢：天方夜譚 (Chinese (Hong Kong))
plot: While traveling through fairy tales thanks to one of Doraemon's gadgets, Shizuka gets lost and ends up stuck in the world of the Arabian Nights story. Doraemon, Nobita, Suneo, and Jyaian must now locate Shizuka somewhere in the imaginary Middle East.
ending_theme: "Yume no yuku e" by Emiko Shiratori
